us.ba3.me.markers

Interface DynamicMarkerMapDelegate


  • public interface DynamicMarkerMapDelegate

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void tapOnMarker(java.lang.String mapName, java.lang.String markerName, PointF screenPoint, PointF markerPoint)
      Called when a dynamic marker is tapped on.

    • Method Detail

      • tapOnMarker

        void tapOnMarker(java.lang.String mapName,
               java.lang.String markerName,
               PointF screenPoint,
               PointF markerPoint)
        Called when a dynamic marker is tapped on.
        Parameters:
        markerName - The unique name of the marker within the dynamic marker layer.
        mapView - The MEMapView on which the tap occurred.
        mapName - The name of the map.
        screenPoint - The point on the screen on where the tap occurred.
        markerPoint - The relative point within the marker where the tap occurred. Useful for markers that have button UI on them.
